title: FT Only: T206 Cobb Bat Off SGC 3.5 & Cy Young Portrait PSA 4
author: wilkiebaby11

posts.post_title: FT Only: T206 Cobb Bat Off SGC 3.5 & Cy Young Portrait PSA 4
posts.post_content:
For trade for Sweet Cap PSA 4 or higher of:
Nap Lajoie with Bat
Cobb Green (3+), 
Johnson Pitching (Piedmont too)
Johnson Portrait
Young Portrait
Young Glove Shows
Young Bare Hand
Mathewson Dark (only Piedmont)
Mathewson Portrait

[IMG]https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/1099/3990/products/img539_1024x1024.jpg?v=1524244130[/IMG][IMG]https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/1099/3990/products/img526_1024x1024.jpg?v=1524244123[/IMG]
Steve- I have T206 cards in high grade commons, HOFers, & Southern League cards in PSA 4-6. Is this what your looking for? LMK. Thanks, Bill

[quote name="bbsports" post=1769112]Steve- I have T206 cards in high grade commons, HOFers, & Southern League cards in PSA 4-6. Is this what your looking for? LMK. Thanks, Bill[/QUOTE]

T206 cards in high grade HOFers in PSA 4-6

^^^
This

I have a PSA-5 Dark-Cap slabbed Christy Mathewson, but it has a miscut qualifier for being off-center top-to-bottom. Think of it cut in the same style as a 1954 Topps card, with nearly no border on top, and lots of space at the bottom. Would you care to take a look at it?

[quote name="robw1959" post=1769254]I have a PSA-5 Dark-Cap slabbed Christy Mathewson, but it has a miscut qualifier for being off-center top-to-bottom. Think of it cut in the same style as a 1954 Topps card, with nearly no border on top, and lots of space at the bottom. Would you care to take a look at it?[/QUOTE]

Appreciate it but I have a lowered end Dark Cap that I think that I would rather keep over a MC qualifier.  Thanks though for the reply.
Steve
